Class GameSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • GameSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameSession
extends java.lang.Thread
    Game session is created for each pair of clients connected. It controls the game flow, players'turns and manipulates game data
    Author:
    Dmitri Samoilov
